main.name: Ugur (Ian) Pekunsal
main.description: I am a web developer at The Portal Connector, a division of Sylogist
main.bio: I came to Canada from Turkey on my own in 2013 when I was 16. That same year, our high school got a new computer science teacher from Waterloo University. My first experience with coding started from there and continued on through college and my personal life. Now I am a web developer at The Portal Connector, where I am one of many highly qualified engineers that produce sophisticated but user friendly CRM systems. In the near future I want to become a valued member of the company and make a strong and visible, positive impact. My primary goal is to propel The Portal Connector to grow consistently while maintaining first class quality and client satisfaction.
main.contactmessage: If you have any additional questions, please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Below is a list of my current skills. This list is an indication of how fast I can solve problems utilizing these technologies.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: As a software developer at Sylogist's 'The Portal Connector' team, I am responsible for integrating Microsoft Dynamics CRM with a CMS system. My duties include developing the front-end according to wireframes and user stories, as well as applying performance fixes to reduce loading times and decrease Azure operating costs.

work.title: Freelance Web Developer
work.description: As a full-time student at Centennial College and part-time freelance software developer for Destinade Travel Tech Solutions Limited, I developed and maintained travel management software. My responsibilities included implementing new features, testing and debugging the software, and providing technical support to customers. I gained valuable experience in software development, project management, and customer service, and contributed to the growth of the company.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: During my time at Gri Creative as a junior developer, I applied custom layouts to existing portals and fixed bugs. I worked closely with senior developers to understand requirements and design specifications, using my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills to create visually appealing and functional layouts. I participated in code reviews and collaborated with colleagues to ensure the quality and consistency of the codebase.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description: Educated customers of various Muskoka and Beau's products via one-on-one interaction. Submitted detailed, accurate reports for inventory, payroll hours, and material used.
